text: Lalla Fatma N'Soumer (born Fatima Sayed Ahmed Oomazian) and also known as Lalla Fatma (c.1830 â€“ c.1863) was an important person in Algeria who fought in a resistance movement when France was invading Algeria. == Legacy == The movie Fatma N'Soumer (2014) is about her. There are many statues, schools and streets in Algeria named after her and many women like her. == References == == Other websites == * * An article confronting information on Lalla Fadhma coming from oral and written sources * Category:1830 births Category:1863 deaths Category:Algerian politicians Category:Berber people Category:History of Algeria
title: Lalla Fatma N'Soumer
